project: AI Employee App - Monday Morning CEO Briefing
description: Automate the Monday Morning CEO Briefing - AI autonomously prepares weekly business summary, revenue tracking, and bottleneck analysis for CEO review

userStories.title: Check Gmail for urgent messages
userStories.description: As CEO, I need to know about urgent emails that arrived over the weekend so I can prioritize my week.
acceptanceCriteria: Query Gmail API for messages marked 'unread' or 'important'
Filter by keywords: urgent, asap, invoice, payment, deadline
Create action files in Needs_Action/ folder for each urgent email
Extract email content: sender, subject, body preview
Log detection to Logs/YYYY-MM-DD.json
Pass if: All urgent emails identified and logged
Logged to Logs/2026-01-13.json
userStories.notes: Use email-manager skill to query Gmail MCP

userStories.title: Check Calendar for upcoming events
userStories.description: As CEO, I need to know what meetings and deadlines are coming up this week.
acceptanceCriteria: Query Calendar API for events in next 7 days
Identify high-priority events (keyword: board meeting, client meeting, deadline)
Create action files in Needs_Action/ folder
Include event details: title, date/time, attendees
Log detection to Logs/YYYY-MM-DD.json
Pass if: All upcoming events identified and logged
userStories.notes: Use calendar-manager skill to query Calendar MCP

userStories.description: As CEO, I need to know how the business performed last week - revenue, tasks completed, and any issues.
acceptanceCriteria: Read previous week's logs from Logs/YYYY-MM-DD.json
Summarize: Total emails processed, calendar events created, tasks completed
Create summary report in Briefings/MONDAY_BRIEFING_YYYY-MM-DD.md
Include: Revenue indicators, bottlenecks identified, proactive suggestions
Generate markdown briefing with executive summary
Pass if: Briefing document created with all sections complete
userStories.notes: Use weekly-briefing skill to generate report

userStories.title: Check business goals and targets
userStories.description: As CEO, I need to know if we're on track for monthly targets.
acceptanceCriteria: Read Business_Goals.md from vault
Compare current progress against monthly targets
Calculate revenue gap to target (e.g., $10,000 - $4,500 = $5,500 gap)
Create summary in briefing highlighting key metrics
Include proactive suggestions if metrics are off-track
Pass if: Goals reviewed and metrics calculated

userStories.title: Generate proactive business suggestions
userStories.description: As CEO, I need actionable insights to improve business performance.
acceptanceCriteria: Review audit logs for subscription costs, software usage
Identify optimization opportunities (e.g., unused software, high costs)
Review completed tasks for bottlenecks (tasks taking longer than expected)
Generate 3-5 proactive suggestions for improvement
Add suggestions section to CEO briefing
Pass if: All suggestions generated and added to briefing

userStories.title: Format and finalize CEO briefing
userStories.description: As CEO, I need a professionally formatted briefing I can review in 5 minutes.
acceptanceCriteria: Create Briefings/MONDAY_BRIEFING_YYYY-MM-DD.md with proper formatting
Include executive summary (key highlights in 2-3 bullet points)
Include Revenue section (MTD performance vs target)
Include Completed Tasks section (what was done last week)
Include Bottlenecks section (what's slowing us down)
Include Proactive Suggestions section (optimization ideas)
Add timestamp and version number at end
Pass if: Briefing document professionally formatted and complete
userStories.notes: Use weekly-briefing skill to generate template, then customize content

userStories.title: Create follow-up task list for CEO
userStories.description: As CEO, I need a prioritized action list of what I need to review/approve this week.
acceptanceCreteria: Review all generated action files from weekend
Include items requiring CEO review (payment approvals, client responses)
Sort by priority: Critical (requires immediate action) → Important (review today) → Low (delegate)
Add estimated time for each task
Pass if: Action list created with all items prioritized
userStories.notes: Create manual task list based on review
